"I see you know eachother," remarked Salveo.

As soon as Nightlight was secure in the CR, he walked over to the comm
pannel and punched a button.

"Salveo here, mission accomplished.  Rodimus what is the situation?"

On 7/3/07, Richard Allen <roborick007@...> wrote:
> ::Kup::
>
> Kup followed the group and then saw Elita.
>
> Kup: Well hello there little one. It's been a while. Come give your Uncle
> Kup a hug.
>
> xochitla2006 <xochitla2006@...> wrote:
>  Elita:
>
>  "ok"said the girl and waited
>
>  Nightlight:
>
>  "Yes I'm" said the femme while she moaned in pain.
>
>  Windlord:
>  "Kenzo!!!"said surpriced the bot"I didnt expect to see you again..."
>
>  --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "CatMaster o" <CatMastero@...> wrote:
>  >
>  > "Elita, just wait out here." Kenzo said as they arrived at the
>  > medical bay door not sure if the girl should see the bots inside
>  > yet.  He proceeded in to meet Salveo.
>  >
>  > "Is she conscious?" Kenzo asked about Nightlight.

>  tries
>  > to help

>  > than it
>  > > was."
>  > >

>  to

>  > door

>  > > > >

>  > door
>  > > > > that lead to the upper levels of the base.

>  > > > that
>  > > > > there are only a couple CR chambers in that room; should they
